title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Learn to build modern web applications with React and Node.js

lessons.title: Welcome to the Course
lessons.content: Welcome! In this course, you will learn everything from HTML to advanced React and Node.js. Get ready for an exciting journey.

lessons.title: How the Web Works
lessons.content: The web works by using the Client-Server model. Your browser acts as the client, sending requests to servers which then send back resources.

lessons.title: Setting up your Dev Environment
lessons.content: Install VS Code, Node.js, and Git. These are the essential tools for any modern web developer.

questions.question: What is the primary role of a web browser?
options: To act as a client and render HTML resources

questions.question: Which tool is NOT part of the essential dev environment mentioned?

lessons.title: Introduction to React
lessons.content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It's component-based and uses a Virtual DOM for efficiency.

lessons.title: JSX and Components
lessons.content: JSX allows us to write HTML-like code in JavaScript. Components are the building blocks of a React application.

title: Data Science Masterclass
description: Complete guide to data science with Python and ML

lessons.title: Numpy Basics
lessons.content: Numpy is the fundamental package for scientific computing in Python. Learn how to handle large, multi-dimensional arrays.

lessons.title: Pandas DataFrames
lessons.content: Pandas provides high-performance, easy-to-use data structures. DataFrames are the heart of data manipulation in Python.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Build iOS and Android apps with React Native

lessons.title: What is React Native?
lessons.content: React Native lets you build mobile apps using only JavaScript. It uses the same design as React.
